abstract: United States and Syria have reportedly been discussing whereabouts of Austin Tice, American freelance journalist who disappeared in Syria more than two years ago.
lead_paragraph: The father of Austin Tice, who disappeared in Syria in 2012, and a State Department official said the governments of the two countries had been in direct contact.

headline.main: U.S. and Syria Discuss Missing Journalist
headline.print_headline: U.S. and Syria Discuss Missing Journalist

snippet: The father of Austin Tice, who disappeared in Syria in 2012, and a State Department official said the governments of the two countries had been in direct contact.
